attributes.action: Remove Lord Phillips from the post of Lord Chief Justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I do not feel Lord Phillips has done a good job as LCJ and I believe he should be removed from the post in place of someone else.
Also I feel the post of Lord Chief Justice should be elected either by a panel of senior legal experts or the general public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
